helpText: e.g. 2016-09-14 would be yyyy-mm-dd, 9/14/2016 would be mm/dd/yyyy, 2016.703 would be decimal and 17058 woulbe numeric (number of days since 1970-01-01)

Label: Tree unique identifiers
helpText: matching the tag number in the field. It can be the same as tree ID.
Description: Tree unique identifiers, matching the tag number in the field if that column was provided in the input, automatically generated if not.

Label: Tree ID
Description: Tree unique identifiers. This was automatically generated if not provided in the input data

Label: Stem ID
helpText: if each stem of one tree does not get unique tag

Label: Measure ID
helpText: if you measured more than one DBH per tree
Description: measure unique identifier if you had more than one measure per stem per year

Label: Life status
helpText: where you say the tree is dead or alive
Description: Logical: TRUE if tree was alive, FALSE if it was dead

helpText: height of measurement for basal diameter
Description: Height of measurement of basal diameter
